org.teamfarce.mirch

Class OrthogonalTiledMapRendererWithPeople

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.renderers.BatchTiledMapRenderer
      • com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.renderers.OrthogonalTiledMapRenderer
        • org.teamfarce.mirch.OrthogonalTiledMapRendererWithPeople
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.maps.MapRenderer, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapRenderer, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class OrthogonalTiledMapRendererWithPeople
extends com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.renderers.OrthogonalTiledMapRenderer
    OrthogonalTiledMapRendererWithPeople This class is an extension of the OrthogonalTiledMapRenderer that deals with rendering sprites aswell. The last layer of the map is designed to be drawn OVER the player sprite and NPCs. So this controls that by drawing each layer until it comes to the last one, then it draws the sprites, then the final layer.

      • render

        public void render()
        This overrides the render method in the super class. It draws all the map layers until the final one. Then it draws all the sprites in the sprite list, then it draws the final layer.
        Specified by:
        render in interface com.badlogic.gdx.maps.MapRenderer
